titles.title: I will sing of my Redeemer

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I will sing of my Redeemer, And His wondrous love to me; On the cruel cross He suffered, From the curse to set me free.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Sing, oh, sing of my Redeemer, With His blood He purchased me, On the cross He sealed my pardon, Paid the debt, and made me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I will tell the wondrous story, How my lost estate to save, In His boundless love and mercy, He the ransom freely gave.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I will praise my dear Redeemer, His triumphant pow’r I’ll tell, How the victory He giveth Over sin, and death, and hell.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I will sing of my Redeemer, And His heav’nly love to me; He from death to life hath brought me, Son of God with Him to be.
